metadata.title: CVE-2017-8397 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed inGNU Binutils 2.28, is vulnerable to an invalid read of size 1 and aninvalid write of size 1 during processing of a corrupt binary containingreloc(s) with negative addresses. This vulnerability causes programs thatconduct an analysis of binary programs using the libbfd library, such asobjdump, to crash.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
